ioio.lib.util.android

Class AndroidIOIOConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioio.lib.util.IOIOConnectionManager
      • ioio.lib.util.android.AndroidIOIOConnectionManager

  • public class AndroidIOIOConnectionManager
extends IOIOConnectionManager
    An extension of IOIOConnectionManager for the Android environment.

    Note: This utility is not typically intended for use by end-users. See IOIOActivity and IOIOSerive for high-level utilities, which facilitate the creation of Android-based applications.

    The reason for this extension is that some Android-related connections (e.g. OpenAccessory) are tightly coupled with the Android Activity life-cycle and require to be notified when certain life-cycle events occur.

    Use this class similarly to IOIOConnectionManager, but in addition call create(), destroy(), start(), stop() and restart() from your activity's onCreate(), onDestroy(), onStart(), onStop() and onRestart(), respectively.
